title: Roasted spring chicken with a morel sauce and parmesan risotto
description: A whole chicken is brined for extra juicy meat and then served with a wild mushroom sauce and creamy risotto.
ingredients: 2 banana shallots, peeled and finely chopped
1 sprig thyme, stalk only (leaves picked and reserved for the risotto)
2 tbsp vin jaune (or 1 tbsp brandy and 1 tbsp white wine)
